diff_hunk:
@@ -209,6 +210,7 @@ def tf_copts(android_optimization_level_override="-O2", is_external=False):
       + if_tensorrt(["-DGOOGLE_TENSORRT=1"])
       + if_mkl(["-DINTEL_MKL=1", "-DEIGEN_USE_VML"])
       + if_mkl_lnx_x64(["-fopenmp"])
+      + if_mkl_darwin(["-Xpreprocessor", "-fopenmp"])
body:
I just patched your PR, and after standard configuration tried the following:
```
bazel test --config=mkl tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:summary_ops_test
```
The result is:
```
external/eigen_archive/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/../../../Eigen/Core:275:10: fatal error: 'omp.h' file not found
#include <omp.h>
         ^~~~~~~
```

So while it clears the "-fopenmp" not found issue, even with "-Xpreprocessor" omp header is not found.
